title: Don't Smile at Me
summary: Don't Smile at Me (stylized as dont smile at me) is the debut extended play by American singer Billie Eilish. Darkroom and Interscope Records released it on AugustÂ 11, 2017. Eilish and her brother Finneas O'Connell wrote most of the material on the EP and were solely responsible for its production. It is an electropop record with elements of R&B and jazz.
